mapper.select: select no, title, main_category, middle_category, writer, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date ,reply_cnt from inquiry_tb order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry_tb(no, title, writer, main_category, middle_category, content) values(seq_inquiry_tb_no.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{mainCategory}, #{middleCategory}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.no, title, main_category, middle_category, writer, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date ,reply_cnt FROM ( select * from inquiry_tb order by no desc ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ boardCntPerPage } * #{ pageNo } ) WHERE RNUM > #{ boardCntPerPage } * ( #{ pageNo } - 1 )
